title: Business AI command center: Modular agents for Google Workspace, vector search & multi-channel reports
description:
# ðŸš€ AI OPS Agent for n8n â€” Stop Doing Busy Work. Start Leading. *Your AI workforce is ready. Are you?* ## ðŸ’° What You Get: Your ROI in 30 Days **Replace 10-15 hours/week of manual work** with intelligent automation that actually understands your business. While your competitors copy-paste data between tools, you'll be making strategic decisions. --- ## ðŸ§  The Powerhouse Stack That Does Everything | **Module** | **Core Job** | **Your Competitive Edge** | |------------|-------------|--------------------------| | **MAIN AGENT** (Grok 4) | Orchestrator & brain | â€¢ Reads your message â†’ builds execution plan
â€¢ Delegates to specialized agents
â€¢ Delivers results through your preferred channel | | **Knowledge Agent** | Company-wide research assistant | â€¢ Vector-searches your Supabase docs instantly
â€¢ Runs live SQL queries for real-time numbers
â€¢ Hunts & parses Drive files automatically
â€¢ Pulls fresh web intelligence via Perplexity | | **Google Sheets MCP Toolkit** | Spreadsheet automation | **Natural-language control** over **read/append/update/clear/create/delete** operations on any tab or range | | **Google Drive MCP Toolkit** | File intelligence pipeline | â€¢ Auto-detects file types & extracts text from PDFs/CSVs
â€¢ Transcribes audio/video content
â€¢ Describes images with GPT-4o Mini | | **Vector Store Loader** | Long-term memory system | â€¢ Auto-chunks new files
â€¢ Creates OpenAI embeddings
â€¢ Stores in Supabase for instant semantic search | | **Postgres Chat Memory** | Conversation context | Never repeat yourselfâ€”every follow-up question builds on previous context | | **Report Agent** | Executive briefing machine | â€¢ Converts raw outputs â†’ clean Markdown â†’ HTML
â€¢ Auto-emails/Slacks/Telegrams polished reports | | **LinkedIn Scraper** | Talent & market intelligence | Scrapes full LinkedIn profiles via Apify, delivers structured JSON for analysis | | **Multi-Channel Triggers** | Meet users where they work | **Slack â€¢ Gmail â€¢ Telegram â€¢ WhatsApp â€¢ HTTP Webhooks** | | **LLM Layer** | Right model, right job | **Grok 4** (reasoning) â€¢ **Claude Sonnet 4** (analysis) â€¢ **GPT-4o Mini** (speed) â€¢ **Perplexity** (live web) | --- ## âš¡ How It Works (The Magic in 5 Steps) 1. **Message arrives** (Slack mention, email, webhook) 2. **MAIN AGENT** analyzes â†’ selects optimal tool chain 3. **Specialized toolkits execute** (Sheets, Drive, SQL, Scraper...) 4. **Knowledge Agent** synthesizes everything using the perfect LLM 5. **Report Agent** packages & delivers results to your chosen channel --- ## ðŸŽ¯ Real Commands That Save Hours Daily > **"Update the Marketing-Spend sheet with last week's totals, then email me a chart."** > > **"Find the product-launch PDF from Drive, summarize key risks, post to Slack."** > > **"Scrape this LinkedIn URL, rank the candidate's skills, add them to our CRM sheet."** > > **"Create a new Sprint 11 tab, copy headers from Sprint 10, and ping the team."** *One command. Multiple systems. Zero manual work.* --- ## Why Choose This Over Other Products: ### âœ… **All Your Data, One Brain** No more jumping between 12 different tools. Your AI agent connects everything. ### You can go further If you want to increase the Agent capabilities or make the more powerfull you can reach the dev. ### âœ… **Vector Search Built-In** Upload a 100-page document once. Search it forever with natural language. ### âœ… **Executive-Ready Reports** Your C-suite gets clean HTML briefs, not raw data dumps that waste their time. ### âœ… **Deploy in Minutes** Plug into your existing n8n setup, add credentials, watch routine ops handle themselves. ---
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
